workoutPlan: Day 1: Chest & Triceps (bench press, dumbbell flys, dips)
Day 2: Back & Biceps (pull-ups, bent-over rows, bicep curls)
Day 3: Legs & Core (squats, deadlifts, leg press, planks)

dietPlan.Breakfast: 1 cup oatmeal with water, 5 scrambled egg whites & 1 whole egg, and a handful of almonds (25g).
dietPlan.Lunch: 200g grilled chicken breast, 1 cup of brown rice, and 2 cups of mixed green vegetables.
dietPlan.Afternoon Snack: 1.5 cups of Greek yogurt mixed with 1 scoop of whey protein and 1/2 cup of berries.
dietPlan.Dinner: 200g lean steak or salmon fillet, a large green salad with light vinaigrette, and 1/2 cup of cottage cheese.

workoutPlan: Day 1: Legs & Core (Barbell Squats: 4x8, Romanian Deadlifts: 3x10, Leg Press: 3x12, Hanging Leg Raises: 3x15)
Day 2: Chest & Triceps (Bench Press: 4x8, Incline Dumbbell Press: 3x10, Dips: 3x to failure, Tricep Pushdowns: 3x12)
Day 3: Back & Biceps (Deadlifts: 4x6, Pull-Ups: 3x to failure, Bent-Over Rows: 3x8, Barbell Curls: 3x10)
Day 4: Active Recovery (Light walk, stretching, or yoga)
Day 5: Shoulders (Overhead Press: 4x8, Lateral Raises: 3x15, Face Pulls: 3x15)
Day 6: Full Body (Focus on compound movements you enjoy)

dietPlan.Breakfast: 4 whole eggs scrambled, 2 slices of whole wheat toast with 1 tbsp of butter, 1 glass of whole milk.
dietPlan.Morning Snack: 1 scoop of whey protein with 250ml of whole milk, 1 banana.
dietPlan.Lunch: 200g grilled chicken breast, 1.5 cups of white rice, 1 cup of steamed broccoli.
dietPlan.Dinner: 150g salmon fillet, 1 large sweet potato, a large portion of green salad with olive oil dressing.
dietPlan.Late Snack: 1 cup of Greek yogurt with 1 tbsp of honey.

workoutPlan: Day 1: 45 min of moderate cardio (jogging, cycling)
Day 2: Full-body strength training (squats, push-ups, rows)
Day 3: 30 min of High-Intensity Interval Training (HIIT)
Day 4: Active Recovery (brisk walking or yoga)
Day 6: 60 min of low-intensity cardio (swimming, incline walking)
